name: Attractorache
description: The earth mother gave birth to three young girls, and in them lay the secret of the dimension. As long as the master of the dimensional mystery can master the fate of the earth, the evil dimensional beasts know these, they Abduct the earth maiden and lock them in the most dangerous place in the universe, this place is the great source.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core 2 Due Q6600 or AMD althon X4 630 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 7600GS or ATI X1600 Pro Storage: 1000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core I5 4170 or AMD FX 6300 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX760 or ATI R7 260X Storage: 1000 MB available space
